title: Child Process Interaction with Pipes
description: In this lab, the usage of std::Child struct to represent a running child process and its interaction through pipes with the stdin, stdout, and stderr handles is demonstrated.

meta.title: Mastering Child Process Interaction with Pipes
meta.description: Explore the power of Rust's std::Child struct for managing child processes and their interaction through pipes.
meta.keywords: Rust, child process, pipes, std::Child, stdin
